name: Winds Of Fate
description:
Winds Of Fate is a puzzle game where you play as a Die makings its way though a cold and lonely world.

Controls:

Move: Arrow keys

Move+Jump: WASD

Restart: Space

Skip level: P

Jumping will cause the dice to flip onto the next face over, the number of the dice will move is the number on top of the dice (jumping in the top left direction with a 1 on top will move you forward 1 and up 1, and flip the dice onto a 3). The rotation animation is a little jank, however I assure you, it does work.
